text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Savur | image_skyline = | image_caption = | image_shield = | pushpin_map = Turkey | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Province | subdivision_name1 = Mardin | subdivision_type2 = | subdivision_name2 = | leader_party = BDP | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = Mehmet Aydın Alökmen | leader_title1 = Kaymakam | leader_name1 = Vehbi Bakır | area_footnotes = | area_blank1_title = District | area_blank1_km2 = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_urban = | population_as_of = | population_blank1_title = District | population_blank1 = | population_density_blank1_km2 = auto | postal_code_type = Post code | postal_code = 47860 | website = }} Savur is a district of Mardin Province in Turkey. It is also the name of a town in that district. Nobel laureate Aziz Sancar was born in this district in 1946. ==References== Category:Districts of Turkey Category:Southeastern Anatolia Region
